title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
. We can celebrate tonight and discuss a plan in the morning. Moonrise Towers holds more answers. Halsin thanked us and said that Rath would surely reward us for our efforts.

Halsin thanked us and said that Rath would surely reward us for our efforts. Halsin said that we're in no immediate danger, and that answers are at Moonrise Towers. We can celebrate tonight - and discuss a plan in the morning. A druid named Halsin said we're in no danger for now. We can celebrate tonight and discuss a plan
